data.title: Aurigny Adds More European Flights
data.meta_description: Aurigny has added more direct flights to Europe to its winter schedule.
data.text:
Aurigny has added more direct flights to Europe to its winter schedule.

Islanders will be able to fly to Geneva in February Half Term, and to Paris and Nice in March.

There will also be March flights to Copenhagen, in addition to those operating in November.

The airline had previously announced pre-Christmas fights to Amsterdam, Bordeaux, Copenhagen, Barcelona, Prague and Cologne to tap in to demand from islanders to travel abroad.

Aurigny says some destinations sold out within four hours.

“We recognise that many Bailiwick residents have not travelled abroad for almost two years and that direct flights with Aurigny Assurance offer them the opportunity to finally take flight.” - Malcolm Coupar, Commercial Director.

The latest additions begin on 18 February 2022.

18th February – Guernsey to Geneva, Switzerland – returning 21st of February.

21st February – Guernsey to Geneva, Switzerland – returning 25th of February.

25th February – Guernsey to Geneva, Switzerland – returning 28th of February.

4th March – Guernsey to Paris, France – returning 7th of March.

11th March – Guernsey to Copenhagen, Denmark – returning 14th March.

18th March – Guernsey to Nice, France – returning 21st March.
